title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
description: When attempting to access the group dialog, an error is displayed instead of showing the dialog. As part of the template requirements, the UI should not perform validation.
OB: When trying to access the group dialog without setting a dataset, an error is shown instead of the dialog.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even if a dataset is not set.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the group section.
3. Try to access the group dialog without setting a dataset.
4. Observe the error message instead of the group dialog.
